context_of_use: This use case allows power users to execute bulk actions to process many records efficiently.
stakeholders_and_interests: power user: Efficient processing of records
description: Allows power users to execute bulk actions (e.g., import, update, delete) to process many records efficiently.
triggering_event: Power user initiates a bulk operation.
assumptions: The power user has the necessary permissions to perform bulk operations.
requirements_met: The system shall allow power users to perform bulk operations efficiently.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of bulk operations supported.
main_flow: 1. Power user initiates authentication → System verifies user credentials.
2. Power user selects bulk operation type → System displays available options.
3. Power user provides necessary data for the operation → System processes the data.
4. System confirms successful execution of the bulk operation.
